name: zone_validation
description: Validate psychology zone system with archetype personalities
hypothesis: Each archetype spends majority time in home zone, penalty visits match PRD targets (Baseline 70-85%, Medium 10-20%, High 2-7%, Full Tilt 0-2%)

personalities.name: Queen of Hearts
personalities.description: poise=0.25, ego=0.89 - MOST VOLATILE, expects frequent tilt

personalities.name: Napoleon
personalities.description: ego=0.86, poise=0.65 - Moderately volatile, high confidence

personalities.name: Bob Ross
personalities.description: poise=0.85, ego=0.50 - Very stable, high composure baseline

personalities.name: Sherlock Holmes
personalities.description: poise=0.85, ego=0.42 - Most stable, analytical composure
